name: .PFL
summary: Learn about .PFL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a PFL file with PlotSoft PDFill (Windows). To do so:
Select File → Open Project to Resume Editing from PDFill's menu bar.
Navigate to and open your PFL file.
PlotSoft PDFill can export the PDF that a PFL file contains in several formats, including:
To export as a PDF, select File → Save the edited PDF As. To export in other formats, select File → Export.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pfl file in PlotSoft PDFill
images.caption: PFL file open in PlotSoft PDFill
